Articles.Content: Kerbals have medical issues especially with standing and moving. They glitch through parts and they fall on a 1 cm bump. They can't stand on in a closed area that is moving at parking lot speeds. Please help these poor green men. But seriously all jokes aside the kerbals need to not move when in a cargo bay moving at 5km/h. And they need to not fall when they walk over a tiny bump that I can't see with my 1080p resolution. And they need to not glitch through parts when walking at them. Please squad fix the kerbals in this game.

I find it more annoying that they can explode by walking (one Eve, or in timewarp on Kerbin).

Yes, they should be fixed.

Valentina fell 0.5m from my rover onto Tylo.

I support this.

-SPAddict
My computer is so weak my kerbal dies by walking because it's clipping into the ground half the time when walking.
It's especially ironic, given that a kerbal can fall out of space, reenter Kerbin atmosphere, and hit the ground (or sea) with no problem and survive...
Could someone get a dev on this thread
You're not the first one to report bugs with Kerbals. If you found something new, then report it to the bug tracker. Otherwise chances are the devs are already on it.

Maybe Kerbals like their snacks a bit too much? Lol.

Kerbals have medical issues especially with standing and moving. They glitch through parts and they fall on a 1 cm bump. They can't stand on in a closed area that is moving at parking lot speeds. Please help these poor green men. But seriously all jokes aside the kerbals need to not move when in a cargo bay moving at 5km/h. And they need to not fall when they walk over a tiny bump that I can't see with my 1080p resolution. And they need to not glitch through parts when walking at them. Please squad fix the kerbals in this game.
